description:
The relay race is the highlight of the sports meet. Fatton has been selected as the anchor for the White Team... and the Red Team`s anchor is Gabriel. Gabriel is excited to show his stuff with the new shoes his dad bought him, but the slow-running Fatton`s mood is at an all-time low. When he asks his mother for advice, she decides to help him prepare for the meet with a rigorous training program! Will Fatton be ready for the big race?!
Source: crunchyroll
